column4: hew can someone point me to documentation or tell me how to Enable ATi and Nvidia driver at the same time on Ubunut?
sorry I don't know... but I want to ask you something.. what are the models of your graphic cards ?
I'm going to buy a new box.. I've tried ati and the driver catalyst is s**t.. so, I wanted to ask you.. does the nvidia driver work good ? or is it like the ati
guess,.. I'll go with nvidia then.. thanks dude
